title: "Splashdown Confirmed": SpaceX Starship Rocket Soft Lands In Indian Ocean
content: Elon Musk's SpaceX successfully completed its sixth flight test of the Starship spacecraft on Wednesday.

title: Donald Trump Picks China Hawk Howard Lutnick As His Commerce Secretary
content: US President-elect Donald Trump nominated Howard Lutnick, the co-chair of his transition team, as his commerce secretary on Tuesday -- a choice set to bring a tougher stance on China from the incoming administration.
summary: US President-elect Donald Trump nominated Howard Lutnick, the co-chair of his transition team, as his commerce secretary on Tuesday -- a choice set to bring a tougher stance on China from the incoming administration.

title: Over 10,000 North Korean Troops Battle Against Ukraine
content: Around 10,900 North Korean troops have been deployed to Kursk as part of Russia's airborne unit and marines.
summary: Around 10,900 North Korean troops have been deployed to Kursk as part of Russia's airborne unit and marines.

title: Machu Picchu Security Heightened After Tourists Spread Human Ashes
content: Peruvian authorities have tightened security at the Inca citadel of Machu Picchu after tourists there were filmed dispersing what were believed to be human ashes.
summary: Peruvian authorities have tightened security at the Inca citadel of Machu Picchu after tourists there were filmed dispersing what were believed to be human ashes.

title: Main Issue With Pakistan Is Of Terrorism: India's Ambassador at UN
content: "With Pakistan, the main issue we have is of terrorism," India's Permanent Representative to the UN Ambassador Parvathaneni Harish said.
summary: "With Pakistan, the main issue we have is of terrorism," India's Permanent Representative to the UN Ambassador Parvathaneni Harish said.

title: Taliban Removes 'Un-Islamic' Books, Anti-Government Literature
content: Checking imported books, removing texts from libraries and distributing lists of banned titles -- Taliban authorities are working to remove "un-Islamic" and anti-government literature from circulation.
summary: Checking imported books, removing texts from libraries and distributing lists of banned titles -- Taliban authorities are working to remove "un-Islamic" and anti-government literature from circulation.

title: Trump Names Former WWE CEO As Chief Of Department Of Education
content: Donald Trump nominated Linda McMahon, former CEO of World Wrestling Entertainment, on Tuesday to lead the Department of Education, which he has pledged to abolish.
summary: Donald Trump nominated Linda McMahon, former CEO of World Wrestling Entertainment, on Tuesday to lead the Department of Education, which he has pledged to abolish.

title: Google Recruiter's Three Tips To Crack The Tech Giant's Job Interview
content: Google's interviews are famously challenging, but Erica highlights the STAR method as a key tool for success.

title: PM Modi Arrives In Guyana, First Indian Prime Minister To Visit In 56 Years
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Wednesday arrived in Guyana on the last leg of his three-nation visit after attending the G20 Summit in Brazil.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Wednesday arrived in Guyana on the last leg of his three-nation visit after attending the G20 Summit in Brazil.

title: Strangled, Left In Car Trunk: How Harshita Brella Was Killed By Husband
content: The body was of 24-year-old Harshita Brella, an Indian woman who was born in Delhi and moved to the United Kingdom in April this year after marrying Pankaj Lamba in August last year.
summary: The body was of 24-year-old Harshita Brella, an Indian woman who was born in Delhi and moved to the United Kingdom in April this year after marrying Pankaj Lamba in August last year.

title: Ukraine Will Lose If US Cuts Military Funding, Says President Zelensky
content: Ukraine "will lose" its war against Russia if the United States cuts military funding to Kyiv, President Volodymyr Zelensky said.
summary: Ukraine "will lose" its war against Russia if the United States cuts military funding to Kyiv, President Volodymyr Zelensky said.

title: Bitcoin Rises Record-High, Breaches $94,000 For The First Time
content: Bitcoin rose to a record high above $94,000 after reports of Donald Trump's social media company in talks to buy crypto trading firm Bakkt gave hope.
summary: Bitcoin rose to a record high above $94,000 after reports of Donald Trump's social media company in talks to buy crypto trading firm Bakkt gave hope.

title: Japanese Manicurist Takes On Plastic Pollution, One Nail At A Time
content: Japanese manicurist Naomi Arimoto has been using Umigomi, or "sea trash," to make nail art since 2021.
summary: Japanese manicurist Naomi Arimoto has been using Umigomi, or "sea trash," to make nail art since 2021.

title: All About Sean Duffy, Donald Trump's 2nd Cabinet Pick From Fox News
content: Donald Trump has nominated Fox Business host Sean Duffy to be the next Transportation Secretary. The former congressman will replace Pete Buttigieg in January to oversee a huge federal portfolio of infrastructure spending and transit regulations.
summary: Donald Trump has nominated Fox Business host Sean Duffy to be the next Transportation Secretary. The former congressman will replace Pete Buttigieg in January to oversee a huge federal portfolio of infrastructure spending and transit regulations.

title: G20 Ends With Ukraine Allies, Russia Trading Blame Over War Escalation
content: Ukraine's allies and Russia on Tuesday traded blame for a dramatic escalation in the war in Europe, which dominated the final day of talks at a G20 summit in Rio de Janeiro.

title: Trump Taps TVs "Dr. Oz" To Head US Public Health Insurance Program
content: Donald Trump announced Tuesday that he was appointing Mehmet Oz, a former surgeon and TV celebrity known as "Dr. Oz," to lead the United States' massive public health insurance program.

title: SpaceX Fails To Repeat Starship Booster Catch, As Trump Looks On

title: Italy, Japan, UK To Invite More Countries To Co-Develop 6th-Gen Fighter Jet
content: A potential plan to bring in more nations on board the ambitious 6th-generation GCAP jet fighter project was discussed today when the leaders of Italy, Japan and Britain met on the sidelines of the G20 Summit in Brazil.

title: Don't Say His Name - Donald Trump Is The Voldemort Of G20 Summit
content: For world leaders and diplomats at the G20 summit in Rio de Janeiro, US President-elect Donald Trump was the man who cannot be named.
